name: Neon Dash (Arias / Adrien, Célia Déglise, UsherMay, Hippolyte Dubois)
name_original: Neon Dash (Arias / Adrien, Célia Déglise, UsherMay, Hippolyte Dubois)
description:
Neon Dash

A straight runner where you have to dodge obstacles or change colors to go through them.

Credits :

Adrien "Arias" Maginot

Célia "Rocket" Déglise

Hippolyte "Blackporo" Dubois

Yvon "UsherMay" Cocks

Music Deadlocked by F-777 · Jesse Valentine
